item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

About In my research I use insights from nonparametric and functional data analysis to devise new, rigorously guaranteed methods for solving dynamic economic models with infinite dimensional uncertainty and apply these methods to understand the dynamics of economic heterogeneity in a variety of contexts.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I teach the following courses at Carnegie Mellon: 73-374: Econometrics II 73-423: Forecasting for Economics and Business 47-805: Computational Economics (PhD) 47-811: Econometrics I (PhD)
